description: This filling breakfast hash will give you masses of energy all morning and keep you going until lunch.
name: Bacon & Sausage Hash Breakfast Pockets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g pancetta slices or streaky bacon rashers, halved width ways
750g baby potatoes, cut into small chunks
4 tbs Old El Paso thick 'n chunky salsa

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large fry pan over a medium heat and cook the pancetta for 3-4 minutes or until golden. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper. Add the sausages and potatoes to the pan and cook in the oil for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden and tender. Return the pancetta to the pan with the spinach and continue to cook for 2-3 minutes until the spinach has just wilted. Stir in the chives. Season to taste.
Heat the pockets to pack instructions.
Serve warmed pockets with the hash, sour cream and salsa in separate bowls and let everyone fill their own pockets their own way.
